reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Installed in less than a minute. Windows and mirrors work correctly. The backlight is yellow rather than the OEM green, but for the price it's fine. The tiny orange illumination on the left it right mirror button does not turn off like factory, it's stays lit up where you left it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This very much needed part was ordered I line and delivered quickly. He was shocked that it arrived so fast. He grabbed this part from the box and went to install it in his truck. Minutes layer he was finished and was so relieved to have everything working in his truck again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Feels cheap, works greatt
reviews.reviewText: Bought for a 2013 Dodge Grand Caravan, with a 9 pin + 3 pin connection.You're getting what you pay for with this. It feels like cheap plastic. The lights are a sickly yellow instead of the white the OEM parts come with. You can't let the passenger window and driver window up at the same time. The mirror light is red instead of white, and is always on.That said, it does work. It comes with everything you need to install it correctly, and only takes about 5 minutes to pop the old one out and the new one in.All of the window switches worked right out of the box. The auto raise/lower for the front passenger and driver side window works fine. The mirror controls work fine.If you want something that just works and won't break the bank; go for this. If you want something fancy, get something pricier. When/if I need to replace this, I'll order the same part again.Unless I can find one with RGB lights; I'm a sucker for RGB lights on products. (Hint, hint to the manufacturer.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this one since my other one broke and it fit perfectly into my car and it works so much better than the old one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pay attention to led, I received a unit with orange, my truck has the white lights. Also the switches do not work at the same time. I have to roll one window down at a time. Next issue, After about 10 seconds of the driver side door being open, it stops working. I have to turn the light switch off and on to get the power back to the switch panel. I purchased front driver aide switch
